item.description:
the calendar says its March but the xc ski centers' in NH have plenty of snow covering and tomorrow in New London NH it will be a gorgeous sunny low 30s day. So Come join my postponed/Plan B AMC afternoon xc ski trip on the Pine Hill trails. For a FUN casual/easy pace afternoon (approx 3-4hrs) of skiing enjoying the beautiful trails, thanks to the generosity and work of John and other landowners. www.pinehillskiclub.com  

Meet at Pine Hill trails parking lot, 11:30AM (located 1/2 mile east of the junction of Shaker Road and Mountain Road. Look for the ski club sign on the right side of Mountain Road) http://www.pinehillskiclub.com/directions.html

   * Bring your skiis/poles/boots, day pack, water (2 liters recommended), lunch/snack, $12 for the "suggested trail fee/donation" - recommend bringing the exact cash to put in the donation box as there is not always a volunteer collecting the money. ﻿  

 Note - for those that haven't been to Pine Hill, be prepared to ski from the parking lot as there is NO indoor buildings. There is though a clean porta-john for some convenience.

﻿And the nice cozy "Robb's Hut" at the top of the Grand Junction trail which will be open from 11AM - 2PM serving Chili, corn bread and cookies.

 

{After ski } we can go relax and enjoy some hot soup, grub,... at the "Flying Goose Brew Pub & Grille" just up the road from Pine Hill. http://flyinggoose.com/ Before getting on the road for home.
item.how_to_find_us: khaki jeep compass at trail parking lot

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Afternoon XC Ski with AMC
